Name: HitWallTimerSwitch
Notes: An unused button that activates a switch for a set amount of time. The button can be activated using most of the player's attacks. After the time runs out, it will reset itself.

Obj_arg0.Name: Timer
Obj_arg0.Description: How long the switch will remain activated before it resets again. Default is 300.

SW_A.Description: Gets activated when pressing the button.
